description:
At roughly 300 meters in length, the Meltlan Picket is the smallest Meltlandi ship of the line and possibly the smallest capital ship among either the Meltlandi or Zentradi fleets. The Meltlan Picket acts as a forward line of any Meltlandi fleet to which it is attached, helping to warn accompanying vessels of enemy movements.
Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macrossdyrl/meltran-picket.htm
name: Meltlan Picket
